• Managing a group of university ambassadors to promote various space technologies developed by the local students.
  • Arranging seminars and competitions engaging local and international academics,researchers, engineers, and astronauts.

frontmatter.title: Content Reviewer: Quality Assurance and Control

node.html: • Reviewed content of various academic and non-academic projects and courses for content accuracy and quality assurance.

• Helped fellow students build their coding skills online with Microsoft Learn.
  • Organized virtual workshops to help students learn Python Programming Language.
